韅字的基本解释

韅
xiǎn
驾车时套在牲口腹部（一说背部）的皮带。

韅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎn］
［《廣韻》呼典切，上銑，曉。］
系在马背部分的皮带。一说，指马腹带。

韅字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　韅； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1392第26
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?呼典切，音顯。【廣韻】在背曰韅。【集韻】著掖鞥也。【釋名】韅，經也，橫經其腹下也。【荀子·禮論篇】寢兕持虎，蛟韅絲末，彌龍所以養威也。【註】馬服之革，蓋象蛟形。徐廣曰：以蛟魚皮爲之。　又【集韻】【韻會】?馨甸切，音灦。義同。【左傳·僖二十八年】晉車七百乗，韅靷鞅靽。【註】在背曰韅，在腹曰鞅。韅許見反，又去見反。　又【集韻】【類篇】?輕甸切，音俔。義同。【玉篇】同?。　【集韻】或作?。

韅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韅字的起名意思

暂无。

leather girth on horse
Basic explanation of words
leather girth on horse
xiǎn
The belt that is put on the abdomen (or back) of the animal while driving.
leather girth on horse
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎn］
["Guangyun" Hudian cut, milling, Xiao. ]
A belt tied to the back part of a horse. One said, referring to the horse belly belt.
leather girth on horse
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　韅; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1392 Page 26
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Call Dian cut, sound is displayed. [Guang Yun] Said Huang in the back. 【Ji Yun】Zhi Ji also. 【Release name】韅, Jing Ye, traverse the abdomen also. 【Xunzi·Ritual Theory】Even if you sleep with a tiger, you will have a tiger at the end of the dragon's hair, so Milong is also alive and powerful. [Note] The leather of horse clothing has an elephant-shaped cover. Xu Guang said: Take the fish skin as it.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Xindian cut, Yin Hao. The same meaning. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-Eight Years] The seven hundred rides of the Jin car, the 韅靷鞅靽. [Note] It is called Yun on the back, and Martingale on the belly. Xu Xu saw the opposition, and went to see the opposition again.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Lightly cut, sound. The same meaning. [Jade articles] The same?.　【Jiyun】or make?.
